ygData.subject: Greetings all from Palandiriel
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow Bristlebaneese ;) I am a level 3.5 ;)  Enchanter and High Elf...just started my second character after abandoning my Paladin on Fennin Ro.
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings fellow Bristlebaneese ;)
I am a level 3.5 ;) Enchanter and High Elf...just started my second
character after abandoning my Paladin on Fennin Ro. Currently I am
building up my enchanting skills in the Greater Faydark Look for me if
your in the area...and if you ever see a lamp post fishing in Felwithe,
that would be me...I think the fish are attracted to the light ;)

Palandiriel

btw, Palandiriel, in the Elvish language according to the experts
(Tolkien elvish language guide)
means "Sees from afar"
